name: hcss
description: Simple, modular and lightweight CSS framework for building responsive web interfaces.
author: JMF-Alex

scripts.build: sass src/hcss.scss dist/hcss.css --style=expanded && npm run postcss
scripts.build:min: sass src/hcss.scss dist/hcss.css --style=compressed && npm run postcss && copy dist\hcss.min.css docs\css\hcss.min.css
